thread.title: Conveniently located hotel close to Metro lines and attractions in Paris
thread.title_full: Conveniently located hotel close to Metro lines and attractions in Paris - Review of Hotel La Villa des Ternes, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: alecs390
title: Conveniently located hotel close to Metro lines and attractions in Paris
text: The location of the hotel is very convenient with a Metro station just 100m away and is walking distance to various Paris attractions like Arc de Triomphe and Champs Elysees. Cleanliness and sleep quality offered were good as well.
